title: Affair FOUR All
body_text:
It's the all-inclusive, annual tradition that defines
East Coast Dodgeball
.
Welcome to the 2011
Family Affair
spectacular.
ECDElite
Hall of Fame to Induct New Members
It's the prestigious, exclusive hall of famed competitors and on the 18th of June, 2011, the golden doors will reopen to welcome two more of the game's most deserving individuals. Their physical resiliency, mental toughness, and behind-the-scenes contributions have earned the
twelfth
and
thirteenth
inductees spots in this very "elite" group.
Join the celebration when the one and only - and fellow
ECDElitist
-
Christopher Adams
hosts this special attraction at the 4th annual
Family Affair
.
Family Affair IV
Raffle to Send Someone Home Happy
Like every major
ECD
outing, there just has to be an extra ingredient added to the mix. One lucky resident of the
ECD
community will walk away a happy camper. The prize? Well, just leave it to fortunate winner.
Jacobs, Vetrano Clash in Main Event
The stage is set for the year's most anticipated showdown when
ECD
's mightiest finally reach the apex of their careers. 2011's fastest rising superstar
Kenny Jacobs
epically collides with seasoned veteran
Bobby Vetrano
at
Family Affair IV
. Here are their stories ...
JACOBS
★
It was
East Coast Dodgeball's
grandest occasion as a glorious half-decade of memories were relived and revisited during the single-night spectacular known as the
5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY
. That fateful evening produced
Kenny Jacobs
, eager to accept the challenge set forth.
The following months proved fruitful for
ECD
's newest and brightest mainstay as noble soldiers of years' past took notice at the upstart. But despite a powerful right cannon and athletic defensive displays, not much is truly known of Jacobs.
His ascension to the summit has come as fast as it has been furious and chances are, he'll be both physically equipped and mentally prepped for the fight of his life.
→ Born: May 9, 1990
→ Debut: September 11, 2010 | 5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY
→ Entrance Anthem: Eminem "Not Afraid"
VETRANO
★
He was merely a boy among men with the heart of a champion and the capabilities of a skilled, young lion forced to fend for himself. In early 2007, one
Bobby Vetrano's
East Coast Dodgeball
journey arduously commenced, but it wasn't all fun and games.
Catastrophic wars against Pellecchia and "Rimshot King" Letsche - his dastardly cousin no less - helped put the kid on the map. Amidst the ridicule by royal founders and framers, the hungry gladiator Vetrano was left with no alternative but to scratch and claw his way up and above the ranks to cement his name and future legacy.
Now in 2011, an agonizing four-plus calenders, his odyssey will culminate.
→ Born November 13, 1992
→ Debut January 6, 2007 | DODGEBALL 71
→ Entrance Anthem: Metallica "For Whom The Bell Tolls"
While clearly no history or similarities exist between the combatants, the fire and desire within each leading general will be hard to contain within the confines of the dodgeball battlegrounds. Who will raise their hand in triumph? Find out live June 18.
Your presence would be greatly appreciated.
body_html:
It's the all-inclusive, annual tradition that defines East Coast Dodgeball.
Welcome to the 2011 Family Affair spectacular.


ECDElite Hall of Fame to Induct New Members
It's the prestigious, exclusive hall of famed competitors and on the 18th of June, 2011, the golden doors will reopen to welcome two more of the game's most deserving individuals. Their physical resiliency, mental toughness, and behind-the-scenes contributions have earned the twelfth and thirteenth inductees spots in this very "elite" group.

Join the celebration when the one and only - and fellow ECDElitist - Christopher Adams hosts this special attraction at the 4th annual Family Affair.

Family Affair IV Raffle to Send Someone Home Happy
Like every major ECD outing, there just has to be an extra ingredient added to the mix. One lucky resident of the ECD community will walk away a happy camper. The prize? Well, just leave it to fortunate winner.

Jacobs, Vetrano Clash in Main Event
The stage is set for the year's most anticipated showdown when ECD's mightiest finally reach the apex of their careers. 2011's fastest rising superstar Kenny Jacobs epically collides with seasoned veteran Bobby Vetrano at Family Affair IV. Here are their stories ...

JACOBS ★
It was East Coast Dodgeball's grandest occasion as a glorious half-decade of memories were relived and revisited during the single-night spectacular known as the 5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY. That fateful evening produced Kenny Jacobs, eager to accept the challenge set forth.

The following months proved fruitful for ECD's newest and brightest mainstay as noble soldiers of years' past took notice at the upstart. But despite a powerful right cannon and athletic defensive displays, not much is truly known of Jacobs.

His ascension to the summit has come as fast as it has been furious and chances are, he'll be both physically equipped and mentally prepped for the fight of his life.

→ Born: May 9, 1990
→ Debut: September 11, 2010 | 5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY
→ Entrance Anthem: Eminem "Not Afraid"

VETRANO ★
He was merely a boy among men with the heart of a champion and the capabilities of a skilled, young lion forced to fend for himself. In early 2007, one Bobby Vetrano's East Coast Dodgeball journey arduously commenced, but it wasn't all fun and games.

Catastrophic wars against Pellecchia and "Rimshot King" Letsche - his dastardly cousin no less - helped put the kid on the map. Amidst the ridicule by royal founders and framers, the hungry gladiator Vetrano was left with no alternative but to scratch and claw his way up and above the ranks to cement his name and future legacy.

Now in 2011, an agonizing four-plus calenders, his odyssey will culminate.

→ Born November 13, 1992
→ Debut January 6, 2007 | DODGEBALL 71
→ Entrance Anthem: Metallica "For Whom The Bell Tolls"

While clearly no history or similarities exist between the combatants, the fire and desire within each leading general will be hard to contain within the confines of the dodgeball battlegrounds. Who will raise their hand in triumph? Find out live June 18.

Your presence would be greatly appreciated.
